title: John Lillis
contents:
John Lillis Associate Professor Director of Undergraduate Studies   Department of Computer Science  University of Illinois at Chicago    Education:  BS Computer Science, University of Washington, 1989  MS Computer Science, UC San Diego, 1992  PhD Computer Science, UC San Diego, 1996    Research Interests: My main area of interest is 
in Electronic Design Automation (EDA).   I am particularly interested in 
layout optimization, logic synthesis, programmable 
devices and timing optimization.  I also have an interest in 
bridging so-called ``optimization disconnects''
 between traditionally sequential design phases (e.g., between
logic synthesis and physical design).

This work is essentially applied
 combinatorial optimization and so I have a natural interst in
areas such as local
search, Integer Linear Programming, optimality studies, and lower bounding
techniques.  email: lillis@uic.edu   Office: 908 SEO (Science and Engineering Building)  Office Hours:  see calendar below; also available by appointment  Phone: (312) 355-1317  Dept Phone/Fax: (312) 996-3423 / 413-0024  Dept of CS (MC 152) U. of Illinois, Room 1120 SEO 851 S. Morgan St. Chicago, IL 60607-7053      Publications
